references.paper_title: Linear mode connectivity and the lottery ticket hypothesis
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of linear mode connectivity, a phenomenon central to the paper's investigation of the impact of neural network symmetries on loss landscape geometry.

references.paper_title: The role of permutation invariance in linear mode connectivity of neural networks
references.reason: This paper directly addresses the role of parameter symmetries, specifically permutation symmetries, in linear mode connectivity, a key concept explored in the main paper.

references.paper_title: On the symmetries of deep learning models and their internal representations
references.reason: This paper provides a theoretical framework for understanding parameter symmetries in neural networks, which is foundational to the empirical investigation in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Graph metanetworks for processing diverse neural architectures
references.reason: This paper, also authored by some of the authors of the main paper, introduces the concept of metanetworks which is experimentally used in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Git re-basin: Merging models modulo permutation symmetries
references.reason: This paper proposes a method for aligning neural network parameters to account for permutation symmetries, a technique compared to in the main paper’s experiments.
